content.description: Stand start, left hand on the tiniest edgeWork your way up the top arete
content.location: Right of “Baptism of desire AKA Parish Swagger”

content.description: Start on "Hubris at the alter", but instead of going up the iron band in the center of the rock, use this only as a right hand and compress the rock slapping up the sides. Make a scary move at 3/4 height and hope you hit the correct right hand. Run to top out, very good, a bit more scary than the counterpart.
content.protection: A few pads and a spotter or two.
content.location: Same start as Hubris, compress and squeeze the juice out of the line!

content.description: The heel hook mantle Then worming your way up
content.location: Just past “alter boy” next to “Arete tower”

content.description: start in pockets work your way up compressing aretés
content.location: Directly above "couch out"Uphill from "Baptism by Fire" projectLeft of "Baptism of desire AKA Parish Swagger"(crack)LAT/LONG: 41.370215, -82.107807

content.description: match hands on sloper start, left font push, right foot toe clingmove right to rail jug, heel hook reach for top ledge
content.location: Right of "Elywood Dihedral" Downhill from "Couch Out"LAT/LONG: 41.370086, -82.107952

content.description: The hardest moves are probably the lower moves, however there are some big spanning moves up high which aren't hard if you hit the right spots. The beta is tricky to figure out and committing to execute. The route climbs the center of the wall most of the way up until you come to a large sharks tooth hold a little past half way from here begin using the arete left arete. The rock in the center of the climb is rotten the higher you go and will likely break under force...
content.location: Hike in to the fountain area, sitting back near the falls is the beautiful tall spire.

content.description: Classic Lay back Dihedral climb to mantle
content.location: Same wall as the "Baptism by Fire"LAT/LONG: 41.370180, -82.107952

content.description: Start your hands on areteWork your way way up until left hand crimp on flat wallDyno-y move to top
content.location: Directly below "Penetrated Cavity"Uphill from "Baptism by Fire" projectLeft of "Baptism of desire AKA Parish Swagger"(crack)LAT/LONG: 41.370240, -82.107755

content.description: Start as far right and low as possible Traverse the sloping top using the occasional heel hook

climbs.name: Baptism of desire AKA Parish Swagger

content.description: As it is a crack it is entirely finger size dependent.
content.location: The route is located behind the "Baptism by fire" project. Their is some graffiti spelling Swagger crossing over the crack.LAT/LONG: 41.370280, -82.107718

content.description: Work your way up the 2 arete’s
The crux is most likely the top out...
content.location: The route is the first route you will encounter when coming down from the entrance. The route starts in the back of a small roof on a jug and tops out near the small tree.

content.description: Northeast Ohio Sandstone, surprisingly more solid than other areas. Has a handful of good routes and plenty of room for development. Be respectful of the area, as climbing access is murky, try to pick up a few pieces of trash each time you go.
